verbose_text: As expected from our previous study, we did not observe macroscopic disease symptoms on PMR4 overexpressing plants 7 dpi (XREF_FIG); and microscopic analysis of callose deposits stained with (1,3)-beta-glucan-specific aniline blue fluorochrome (ABF) XREF_BIBR revealed an elevated callose deposition at sites of attempted fungal penetration in the powdery mildew resistant PMR4 overexpressing lines compared to wild-type (XREF_FIG).
